# wikijs Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "wikijs" {
  #    host = wikjs_host_url  # Oor pass as env var WIKIJS_HOST
  #    token = wikijs_api_token # or pass as env var WIKIJS_TOKEN
}

terraform {
  required_providers {
    wikijs = {
      source  = "wikijs"
      version = "0.1"
    }
  }
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
